reviewTitle: A Perfect Day on the Beautiful Ionian!
review_details: Our extended family group of 10- ages 3 to 69- thoroughly enjoyed this wonderful boat trip. Efi & Dimitri were lovely warm hosts. Lots of fish caught in the nets which young and old were delighted to watch come in. The secluded swimming spot we were taken to was paradise on earth. Our catch was perfectly cooked- absolutely delicious with plenty of food (and drink) to go around. We will remember this day for many years to come. Highly recommended!
Absolutely five star service, top location, spacious and clean rooms. Worth the price. Would definitely stay here again.
Rude and unhelpful staff, outdated and not very clean rooms, tiny bathroom, breakfast not great. Swimming at the front of the hotel was nice but overall I would not stay here again.

reviewTitle: Lovely place to stay in Hydra.
review_details: Elegant old world feel. Our room was very very clean. Staff helpful. Breakfast was delicious. Great location, a short walk to restaurants etc.
